channel.title: Drafts on Reviews Per Minute
channel.description: Recent content in Drafts on Reviews Per Minute

item.title: Love Lies Bleeding (2024) - 104 mins
item.description: The last two seconds of SAINT MAUD prove Rose Glass is a visceral filmmaker and that’s on full aural and visual display in LOVE LIES BLEEDING: we hear the sounds of muscles stretching and throats constricting; we see jawbones breaking and blood spatter squelching.

item.title: The Vourdalak (Le Vourdalak) (2023) - 90 mins
item.description: Though a little off-putting, there’s something charming about the vourdalak puppet who looks something like a Jan Švankmajer creation crossed with one of Mike Mignola’s skeletons from Hellboy in Hell.
